divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving east bound on hiway 10 between the towns of Alton Iowa and Granville when I suddenly saw 7 white lights hovering about 35 degrees off of the horizon. I watched for no more then 10 seconds and they faded one by one. I took out my cell phone to record them if they came back on but nothing. After this report I am going outside to scan the sky again with my cell phone hoping to capture what i saw so i can share with anyone interested.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Granville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: seen about 7 lights hovering and as soon as i seen them they slowly disappeared
